came.utils.preprocess.quick_pre_vis¶

came.utils.preprocess.quick_pre_vis(adata, hvgs=None, normalize_data=True, target_sum=10000.0, batch_key=None, n_pcs=30, nneigh=10, vis='umap', color=None, copy=True, **hvg_kwds)¶
